maqras.text: hananim-i geudaeui ma-eum-eul pyeolchisa
geudaeui mugeoun jim-eul deol-eo jueoss-eumyeo
geudaeui deung-e issneun geu jeom-eun mugeoun geos-ieossnola
hananim-i geudaeui wichileul nop-i dueoss-eumyeo
gonan-i iss-eudoe guwon-eul bad-eul geos-ila
sillo gonan-i iss-eudoe guwon-eul bad-eul geos-ila
geuleomeulo swiji malgo nolyeoghamyeo
junimkke gang-guhala
muhwagwawa ollibeuleul dugo maengsehasa
sinai san-eul dugo maengsehamyeo
anjeonhan i do-eub-eul dugo maengse hanani
hananim-eun ingan-eul jeil aleumda un hyeongsang-eulo bich-eusin hu
geuui wichileul gajang najge hayeoss nola
geuleona mid-eum-eulo seon-eul haenghaneun uiloun jadeul-eun je-oedoeeo geudeul-ege neun kkeunh-im-eobsneun bosang-i issnola
dagaol simpan-ui nal-e gwanhayeo geudaeleul bujeonghaneun iyuneun mueos-inyo
gajang hullyunghan simpanjaneun hananim i anideonyo
manmul-eul changjohasin junim-ui ileum-eulo ilg-eula
geubun-eun hanbang-ul-ui jeong-aeg-eulo in gan-eul changjohasyeossnola
ilg-eula junim-eun gajang eunhyeloun bun-eulo
yeonpillo sseuneun geos-eul galeuchyeo ju syeoss-eumyeo
ingan-i alji moshaneun geosdo gi leuchyeo jusyeossnola
geuleona ingan-eun omanhayeo beomju leul neom-eoseo
seuseulo chungmanhada saeng-gaghadoda
sillo modeun ingan-eun junimkkelo gwiuihanola
gidoleul geumjihan jaleul boassneunyo
geuneun balo gidohaneun hananim ui jong-eul banghaehayeossnola
geuga bog-eum-ui gil wie iss-eossdasaeng-gaghaneunyo
animyeon sin-ang-e gyeong-geonhala myeong lyeong-eul bad-assda saeng-gaghaneunyo
geuga jinlileul geoyeoghago oemyeon hayeossda saeng-gaghaneunyo
hananimkkeseo jikyeo bosim-eul geu neun alji moshaneunyo
geulo hayeogeum alge halini geuga dannyeomhaji anhneundamyeon geuui apmeo lileul kkeul-eogalila
geu meolineun geojisgwa joeag-ui meolila
geuleon hu geulo hayeogeum geuleul doul donglyodeul-eul bulleo moige hago
hananim-eun geuege daleun eungbeol ui cheonsadeul-eul buleulila
geuleomeulo geuleul ttaleuji malla buboghayeo gyeongbaehago hananimkke gakka i hala
seonsillo hananim-eun geolughan bam-ei gyesileul naelinani
geojughan bam-i mueos-inji mueos-i geudaeege seolmyeonghayeo juliyo
geolughan i bam-eun cheongaewolboda deo hullyunghan bam-eulo
i bam-e cheonsadeulgwa gabeuliel cheonsaga junim-ui myeonglyeong-eul bad-a ganglim hayeo
achim dongnyeok-kkaji meomuleumyeo pyeong-an hasoseo lago insahadeola
seongseoui baegseongdeul gaunde jinli leul geoyeoghan jadeulgwa bulsinjadeul-eun bun myeonghan yejeung-i geudeul-ege ileul ttae kkaji geudeul-eun gil-eul tteonalyeo haji ani hayeossnola
i yejeung-eun seongseuleoun malsseum-eul nangsonghal hananim-ui seonjijalo
geu an-eneun olbaleun yulbeob-i iss nola
seongseoui baegseongdeul-eun geudeul-ege bunmyeonghan yejeung-i ileul ttae kkaji uigyeon-euldallihaji ani haess-euni
geudeul-ege jueojin myeonglyeong-eun ha nanim-eul gyeongbaehago jinsilhan mid-eum-i doedolog geubunkke heonsinhamyeo gidoleul deuligo iseullamseleul bachineun geosdeul-ichamdoen sin-ang-ila
sillo seongseoui baegseongdeul jung-e jin lileul geoyeoghan jadeulgwa bulsinjadeul-eun buljiog-e issge doelini geudeul-eun geu an-eseo yeongjuhamae gajang saaghan mu lideul-ila
geuleona mid-eum-eulo seon-eul silcheonhaneun jadeul-eun gajang uiloun jadeullo

geudeul-eul wihae junim-ui bosang-i issnani mit-eulo gangmul-i heuleuneun yeong saenghal eden-ui cheongug-ila hananim-eun geudeullo gippeohasigo geudeul-eun geubun-eulo gippeohalini geugeos-eun junim-eul du lyeowohaneun ja-e daehan bosang-ila
daejiga simhage jindong-eul hamyeo
daejiga geusog-e issneun geosdeul-eul mil-eonaedoda
ingan-eun bitanhago gohamchimyeo eo jjidoen il-inyo
geunal daejineun geuui sosig-eul yaegihalini
sillo junim-eun geue gwanhae gyesihayeossnola
geunal salamdeul-eun yeogi jeogi mudeom-eseo ttejieo nawa geudeul-ui eobjeogdeul-eulboinola
tikkeulmanhan seon-ilado silcheonhan ja neun geugeos-i bog-i doem-eul al geos-imyeo
tikkeulmanhan ag-ilado jeojileun ja neun geugeos-i ag-i doem-eul allila
jiljuhaneun mal-eul dugo maengsehasa
bulkkoch-eul twigineun mal-eul dugo maeng sehamyeo
saebyeog-e gong-gyeoghaneun mal-eul dugo maengsehanani
meonjileul il-eukimyeo
jeog gipsug-i doljinhaneun mal-eul dugomaengsehasa
sillo ingan-eun junimkke gamsahal jul moleudeola
ingan-eun geuga haenghan geos-eul jeung-eon hal geos-imae
jaemul-e tam-ighaneundeman yeoljungha nola
